mapper.select: select * from User where (userIdx, loginPassword, nickName, userPhoneNumber, userEmail, userPhoto, userAddress, socialStatus) values (#{userIdx}, #{loginPassword}, #{nickName}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhoto}, #{userAddress}, #{socialStatus})
select * from product where (productIdx, productTitle, productContent, updateAt) values (#{productIdx}, #{productTitle}, #{productContent}, now())
select * from comment where (commentIdx, commentTitle, userIdx, imageIdx, updateAt) values (#{commentIdx}, #{commentTitle}, #{productIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{imageIdx}, now())
